{"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-09-02T08:15:32", "sender_email": "paula@londonnest.com", "recipient_email": "coralmoliiplana@gmail.com", "subject": "Re: London Nest: Confirmation Letter & Welcome Sheet \ud83c\udfe0", "message": "Hi Coral\\n\\nI hope you are well\\n\\nIn order for us to prepare your check in, please confirm what day/time are you planning to arrive\\n\\nI look forward to hearing from you soon\\n\\nPaula\\n\\n[]\\n\\nOn Tue, 2 Sept 2025 at 10:14, Saifur Rahman <[saifur@londonnest.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Coral,\\n\\nI hope you are well.\\n\\nYour booking has been confirmed! \ud83c\udf89\\n\\nAttached are some important documents for your records. My colleague Paula will email you separately with the check-in instructions and details on how to collect your keys.\\n\\nJust a heads up - London Nest provides bedding items but no kitchen utensils as these aren't provided. The good news? You can pre-order everything you need from [UniKitOut](), and it'll be ready and waiting for you when you arrive on campus. Shop Now and save 10% on your order with discount code NEST10.\\n\\nWe greatly value your feedback. If you could spare a minute to share your positive experience with us on [TrustPilot]() and Google, it would be truly appreciated. Your review will help others feel confident in choosing London Nest too. Thank you for choosing us!\\n\\nWarm regards,\\nSaif\\n\\n--\\n\\nSaifur Rahman\\n\\nSales Manager\\n\\n25 Horsell Road, London, N5 1XL, United Kingdom\\n\\nT: +44 (0)20 7697 0009 M: +44(0)7523 044 662\\n\\n[www.londonnest.com]()\\n\\n[Facebook icon]() [LinkedIn icon]() [Twitter icon]()\\n\\n[Terms & Conditions]()\\n\\nThis email is from London Nest Ltd. The email and any attachments are confidential and may contain privileged information, and are intended for the named addressee(s) only.", "snippet": "Hi Coral I hope you are well In order for us to prepare your check in, please confirm what day/time are you planning to arrive I look forward to hearing from you soon Paula On Tue, 2 Sept 2025 at 10:14", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "paula@londonnest.com", "student_email": "coralmoliiplana@gmail.com"}
